key_learnings: One-liner: AI-first CRM with automation + governance
Target: Teams needing lightweight CRM with real automation
Key pillars: Automation with safeguards, governance, modern stack
Inter font and Material Symbols loaded
TypeScript strict mode, no any types
Tier 1 blockers: typecheck, build, test coverage, eslint

invariants_acknowledged: Primary brand color is #137fec (not blue-600 or other blues)
All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators
Text contrast must meet 4.5:1 ratio for WCAG AA
Response time must be <200ms (p99 <200ms per KPI)
Lighthouse score must be ≥90 in all categories
Dark mode must be supported with proper color variants
Material Symbols Outlined is the only icon library
TypeScript strict mode with no any types
Public pages use (public)/ route group convention
Features content must be extracted to JSON for reusability
Conversion tracking must be configured for analytics

risks_identified.risk: No existing mockup for Features page
risks_identified.mitigation: Follow patterns from existing home page and brand guidelines

risks_identified.risk: Performance budget <200ms might be challenging with many images/icons
risks_identified.mitigation: Use optimized SVG icons, lazy loading, and Next.js Image optimization

risks_identified.risk: Content not finalized (12 features to showcase)
risks_identified.mitigation: Extract to JSON file for easy updates, use placeholder content initially

questions_resolved.question: Should Features page be under (public)/ route group?
questions_resolved.answer: Yes, per sitemap.md: public pages use (public)/ to separate from authenticated routes

questions_resolved.question: Which features should be showcased?
questions_resolved.answer: Based on positioning.md and existing capabilities: AI scoring, contacts, pipeline, automation, documents, multi-tenancy, AI insights, security, compliance

questions_resolved.question: Should we implement conversion tracking now?
questions_resolved.answer: Yes, per artifacts requirement: conversion-tracking.js must be created
